products.title: Splash Duck Egg Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash duck egg perfect fit roller blind is a beautiful light blue, green colour. So subtle in colour it will update most spaces, perfect for introducing colour when paired with natural and wooden tones. Perfect fit roller blinds clip straight onto the window frame, which provides a hassle free, no drilling way to update your window. The framework comes in 4 different shades to match your window frame.

products.title: Splash Dark Grey Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash dark grey is a stylish, on trend colour which will work well throughout the home, particularly in kitchens and bathrooms as the fabric is moisture resistant. The perfect fit roller blind is an effective, no hassle way to fit a blind to any window. This blind comes in a slimline frame and clips directly onto the window, which means no drilling. The framework is also available in 4 different colour options to compliment any room.

products.title: Splash Bright Orange Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash bright orange perfect fit roller blind is perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this bold orange perfect fit blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Blush Pink Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash blush pink is a beautiful light pink shade, and works perfectly with cool greys but also natural and wood tones. A real all rounder & great for injecting colour into any room. Their perfect fit blinds are perfect for upvc windows where a screw-free solution is needed. Using sleek framework and brackets that slide under the window beading, their perfect fit blinds come in a wide array of fabrics and finishes to suit your needs.

products.title: Splash Black Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful and contemporary. Opt for splash black to create a chic statement look in your home. Their roller blinds can be manufactured with either white or chrome control chains which ensures you get the desired finish for your room. Also, as their made to measure blinds come with a 5 year guarantee you can rest assured you are investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Chilli Red Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash chilli red perfect fit roller blind is perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this medium red perfect fit blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Grama
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 300mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open/close and beaded chrome chain to tilt louvres, or wand control to open/close and twist wand to tilt louvres. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
